$comment: description of a type of files inside a domain.

description.$comment: a string describing what this file type stands for.

suffix.$comment: the dot-starting suffix of this type of files, or an empty string, if they do not have any.

mimetype.$comment: a string representing the MIME type of the content. In probable cases where no valid MIME type exists, you can 'define' a human-readable type, e.g. binary/matlab, or binary/igor.

channels.$comment: a section describing what channels of signals are recorded in this domain.
